effect.black_white: Changes the target’s ability to insomnia. If the target’s ability is truant or multitype, this move will fail.
effect.black_2_white_2: Changes the target’s ability to insomnia. If the target’s ability is truant or multitype, this move will fail.

short_effect.black_white: Changes the target’s ability to Insomnia.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Changes the target’s ability to Insomnia.

flavor_text.black_white: A seed that causes worry is planted on the target. It prevents sleep by making its Ability Insomnia.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A seed that causes worry is planted on the target. It prevents sleep by making its Ability Insomnia.
